title: Yellowstone elk don't budge for wolves, say scientists

title_detail.value: Yellowstone elk don't budge for wolves, say scientists

summary: Elk roam the winter range that straddles the northern boundary of Yellowstone National Park with little regard for wolves, according to a new study illustrating how elk can tolerate living in close proximity to the large predator.
